name: Vertical Row
description: Row against vertical surface like wall or sturdy table
unlock_requirements: 10 reps x 3 sets of Scapular Pulls
form_cues: Pull elbows back, squeeze shoulder blades

name: Incline Row
description: Row with body at an incline, hands on elevated surface
unlock_requirements: 15 reps x 3 sets of Vertical Row
form_cues: Straight body line, pull elbows back

name: Horizontal Row
description: Row with body parallel to ground, feet on floor
unlock_requirements: 12 reps x 3 sets of Incline Row
form_cues: Body straight, pull chest to bar

name: Wide Row
description: Horizontal row with wide hand position
unlock_requirements: 8 reps x 3 sets of Horizontal Row
form_cues: Focus on upper back, retract scapulae

name: Ring Row
description: Horizontal row performed on gymnastic rings
unlock_requirements: 10 reps x 3 sets of Wide Row

name: Weighted Inverted Row
description: Horizontal row with added weight on chest
unlock_requirements: 8 reps x 3 sets of Ring Row

name: Archer Row
description: One arm rows while other is extended
unlock_requirements: 8 reps x 3 sets with 10kg of Weighted Inverted Row
form_cues: Full range of motion, one side at a time

name: One Arm Ring Row
description: Inverted row on rings using only one arm
unlock_requirements: 5 reps each side x 3 sets of Archer Row

name: Feet Elevated One Arm Row
description: One arm row with feet elevated to increase difficulty
unlock_requirements: 5 reps each arm x 3 sets of One Arm Ring Row
form_cues: Body parallel to ground, controlled movement

name: L-Sit Ring Row
description: Horizontal row with L-sit position for maximum difficulty
unlock_requirements: 5 reps each arm x 3 sets of Feet Elevated One Arm Row
